@attributes.Name: HTTP
@attributes.Description: HTTP

@attributes.Name: HTTPS
@attributes.Description: HTTPS

@attributes.Name: AppData Config Path
@attributes.Description: IMPORTENT Change to /mnt/user/appdata/jitsi/web/

@attributes.Name: LetsEncrypt
@attributes.Description: Container Path: /etc/letsencrypt

@attributes.Name: Transcripts
@attributes.Description: Container Path: /usr/share/jitsi-meet/transcripts

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_AUTH
@attributes.Description: Enable authentication: 0 OR 1

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_GUESTS
@attributes.Description: Enable guest access: 0 OR 1

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_LETSENCRYPT
@attributes.Description: Enable Let's Encrypt certificate generation: 0 OR 1

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_HTTP_REDIRECT
@attributes.Description: Redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS (necessary for Let's Encrypt): 0 OR 1

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_TRANSCRIPTIONS
@attributes.Description: Enable Jigasi transcription in a conference

@attributes.Name: DISABLE_HTTPS
@attributes.Description: Handle TLS connections outside of this setup

@attributes.Name: JICOFO_AUTH_USER
@attributes.Description: XMPP user for Jicofo client connections

@attributes.Name: LETSENCRYPT_DOMAIN
@attributes.Description: Domain for which to generate the certificate

@attributes.Name: LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL
@attributes.Description: E-Mail for receiving important account notifications (mandatory)

@attributes.Name: PUBLIC_URL
@attributes.Description: Public URL for the web service

@attributes.Name: XMPP_DOMAIN
@attributes.Description: Internal XMPP domain

@attributes.Name: XMPP_BOSH_URL_BASE
@attributes.Description: Internal XMPP server URL for BOSH module

@attributes.Name: XMPP_GUEST_DOMAIN
@attributes.Description: XMPP domain for unauthenticated users

@attributes.Name: XMPP_MUC_DOMAIN
@attributes.Description: XMPP domain for the MUC

@attributes.Name: XMPP_RECORDER_DOMAIN
@attributes.Description: Domain for the jibri recorder

@attributes.Name: ETHERPAD_URL_BASE
@attributes.Description: Set etherpad-lite URL

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_BREWERY_MUC
@attributes.Description: MUC name for the Jibri pool

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_PENDING_TIMEOUT
@attributes.Description: MUC connection timeout

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_USER
@attributes.Description: Internal user for Jibri client connections.

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_XMPP_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: Internal password for Jibri client connections.

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_USER
@attributes.Description: Internal recorder user for Jibri client connections

@attributes.Name: JIBRI_RECORDER_PASSWORD
@attributes.Description: Internal recorder password for Jibri client connections

@attributes.Name: ENABLE_RECORDING
@attributes.Description: Enable recording conference to local disk
